name: Champion of Gruumsh: Barbarian 10/ Rogue 2/ Blackguard 28
author: Mick Dagger

posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content:
Champion of Gruumsh is a dark brute, a paragon of chaos. He hits everything in his way with a devastating force, ripping it to shreds.

The build is inspired by the "Strongarm Orc" and "The Antipaladin" by Valerfor.
But I also kept in mind something grizzled_dwarflord once wrote: "It is my opinion that Blackguards just can't compete with Paladins in that (charisma) category.// I just think of Blackguards as wonderfully delicious fighters complete with sneak attacks, great summon spells, better saves, Taunt, Bulls Strengths and the list goes on and on."

Special features:
The BG Bull's strength lasts for 28 hours. It stacks with the spell/potions of Bull's. Rage gives a +4 boost to strength. It is possible to reach the cap of strength 48 with these means
Taunt can give you another +6 to AB
The Epic Vrock is a potent summon.
Use your heavy sneak attack bonus, either by knocking your target prone or by flanking when they attack your summons.
UMD gives access to magic from scrolls in epic levels

Gear:
An item with a +3 dexterity bonus will "fill the gap" and max the dex bonus of full plate armors with a +2 to AC.
Charisma gear will improve all saves and the AB of Smite good.

Tweaks:
If you feel that you need more AC, you may pick a one handed weapon and carry a shield. You can do that by picking Weapon focus in a one hander, or you can keep your two-hander as main weapon and just go sword'n board when you need it, The AB will still be very good.

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
What's this, a Max AB Blackguard?

I like it Mick, and i like it not only for the (AB or Dmg), but for its' originality as well.Well done man!

posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content:
Valerfor wrote:What's this, a Max AB Blackguard?

I like it Mick, and i like it not only for the (AB or Dmg), but for its' originality as well.Well done man!
I went straight for AB and damage. Strength is AB and damage. Half orc is strength. Barbarian rage is strength. Blackguard is full AB, Bull's strength, Taunt and SA damage.
Everything else is the proverbial icing on the cake: There was even room for a couple of Rogue levels for more SA damage, Evasion, Tumble and UMD.
